item.title: AI_Agentic_Workflow
item.description: Why do this? Now, the apperance of LLM model such as GPT-4, llama3 has brought breakthroughs in the field of AI. However, the tradional LLM interaction is more like a “Non-agent workflow”, where users input the instructions and wait for the output after some time. This lack of room for iterative optimization. AI Agent breaks the deadlock by treating the AI-system as one could think, plan and perform tasks, just
